# Cathedral (Building)
## Overview
**Cathedral**

**Create** 91 Goods, 12 Influence, 84 Labor, 11 Magic (4,960 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Altar (Room)|Altar]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Cell (Room)|Cell]], 1 [[Ceremonial Room (Room)|Ceremonial Room]], 1 [[Confessional (Room)|Confessional]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Crypt (Room)|Crypt]], 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Reliquary (Room)|Reliquary]], 1 [[Sanctum (Room)|Sanctum]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]] 

A center of religious and spiritual leadership.
